response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its immense value and potential impact on your business, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $750,000. This opportunity is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to discussing the details further and potentially securing this remarkable asset for you. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 750000}
